thread.title: Matthew Asercion

author: Matthew Asercion
title: Matthew Asercion
text:
This was the easiest car purchase I made for someone with bad credit ... The Drive Time team was very helpful and worked out a realistic payment plan that would stay within my budget but more so divided the payment plan in smaller bites and have it coincide with my paycheck so there would be no more having to save up and hope we had enough at end of the month .... briallant.
I'm very very very Thankful for the DriveTime team and their assistantance and for giving me the Hope of being able to get a car when I thought all Hope was lost because of my Credit.
Sincerely,
A very Happy Owner of a 2011 Chevy Equinox.
